alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 04 at 12:23AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Locally higher amounts expected in northern and western Laramie county. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Laramie County including the city of Cheyenne. Laramie Valley including the city of Laramie. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impacted. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range Foothills
